probability_assessment.your_adjusted_view: No adjustments needed; the current probabilities reflect a balanced view.

reasoning: Given the negative expected value and poor risk/reward ratio, it is prudent to avoid any position in QQQ at this time. The current market conditions do not support a favorable investment.
